message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for us. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this item at a special price. My proposal is to offer the product to you for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings while providing you with an attractive deal compared to its market value. I believe this arrangement will be mutually beneficial. Kindly let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
